languages.text: "Осторожнее в своем преследовании знаний, магос. Ересь проникает в сердца незаметно, порой рядясь в святые одежды".
"Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее в своем преследовании знаний, магос. Ересь проникает в сердца незаметно, порой рядясь в святые одежды".

traits.locale_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “寻求知识的时候要谨慎行事，贤者。异端邪说有时会顺着求知的欲望，爬进圣人的内心。”
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: “寻求知识的时候要谨慎行事，贤者。异端邪说有时会顺着求知的欲望，爬进圣人的内心。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Faites preuve de prudence dans votre quête de connaissance, magos. Il arrive que l'hérésie se dissimule sous des dehors vertueux. »
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: « Faites preuve de prudence dans votre quête de connaissance, magos. Il arrive que l'hérésie se dissimule sous des dehors vertueux. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ándese con cuidado en la búsqueda del conocimiento, Magos. La herejía a veces entra en los corazones disfrazada con vestiduras sagradas».
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: «Ándese con cuidado en la búsqueda del conocimiento, Magos. La herejía a veces entra en los corazones disfrazada con vestiduras sagradas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「慎重に知識探求の道を歩め、マゴスよ。聖なる祭服をまとった心にも異端が忍び寄ることはある」
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: 「慎重に知識探求の道を歩め、マゴスよ。聖なる祭服をまとった心にも異端が忍び寄ることはある」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Seid bei Eurer Suche nach Wissen auf der Hut, Magos. Ketzerei schleicht sich manchmal in Herzen, die in heilige Gewänder gehüllt sind."
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: "Seid bei Eurer Suche nach Wissen auf der Hut, Magos. Ketzerei schleicht sich manchmal in Herzen, die in heilige Gewänder gehüllt sind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

languages.text: "İrfan arayışında adımlarına dikkat et Magos. Kâfirlik bazen kutsal cübbelerin altında saklanır."
languages.original_text: "Tread carefully in your quest for knowledge, Magos. Heresy sometimes creeps into hearts dressed in holy vestments."

traits.locale_text: "İrfan arayışında adımlarına dikkat et Magos. Kâfirlik bazen kutsal cübbelerin altında saklanır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
